title: Domestic travel spending in France 2012 to 2028
summary: In general Spending in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Spending in billion euros is roughly constant from 2012 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Spending in billion euros, of value 114.9 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Spending in billion euros about 107.2 was reached at Year 2012
